I’d like to pay this now
To pay this invoice now, give us a call and you’ll be able to pay with your credit or debit card. Or alternatively, if you want to pay directly to our account, our entity account details are:
Bank Account: Westpac
Account name: Flick Energy Ltd
Account number: 03-0584-0341115-00
Reference Number: {{ flick_customer_number }}
Please note, we are Z Electric fuelled by Flick – that’s why the account name is Flick Energy.

Where are my Fuel Rewards?
Because we haven’t been able to take payment, we’ve held off depositing your Fuel Rewards just to make sure everything is okay on your account. Not to worry though, once all of the payment side of things is sorted, you’ll have all of the Fuel Rewards that you’ve earned deposited into your Sharetank.

What if I have more than one missed payment?
If there are unpaid Z Electric invoices on your account, the total amount will show on the next billing email you receive from us. We won’t attempt to take payment for outstanding invoices with the next payment, so you’ll need to contact us directly to arrange payment of any outstanding invoices.

Contact us
If you think there’s been a mistake, need to change your payment method or you’d just like to chat things through, we’re here to help. Please call us on 0800 935 328 (0800 Z ELECTRIC) or email us at help@zelectric.z.co.nz and we can get things sorted.
Ngā mihi nui,
The team @ Z Electric
